programme.title: Difret
programme.desc: A true story. 14-year-old Hirut is on her way home when men on horses swoop in and kidnap her. She fought back but accidently killed her would-be husband. Tenacious young lawyer Meza’s decision to defend Hirut threatens not only her career but her life.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ward
programme.desc: It is no coincidence that detective Sarah Kohr intervenes when the life-threatening attack on a Chinese businessman in Hamburg completely overwhelms his bodyguards. Sarah knows that her former colleague Lanz was behind it, but she needs to find out why.

programme.title: Free Money
programme.desc: Based on true stories of the crypto and investment craze of the early 2020-ies. Crypto's allure, wealth's pursuit, and the lessons of a changing financial world collide in an intense journey of three interconnected lives - an unwitting Bitcoin holder, a crypto entrepreneur and a conservative banker.

programme.title: Catch The Wind
programme.desc: Edith is a middle-aged woman, estranged from her son and now about to lose her job as a textile factory worker. With nothing to hold her to her hometown, she decides to move to Morocco where her factory has relocated instead of facing unemployment.

programme.title: Murder At Land's End
programme.desc: A woman’s body is found washed up on a beach. Labelled as a murder case, it resembles a sinister, old Breton legend about the transportation of dead souls. Captain Meyer takes on the case but is instead intrigued by his mysterious partner, Captain Leroy.

programme.title: Adventures In The Land Of Asha
programme.desc: After 9-year-old Jules is banned from school because of his rare skin disease, his greatest wish is to be cured. He meets a mysterious new friend, Asha, after his dog runs away into the forest. Together, they go on an adventure to find a cure for him.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Yusuf’s best friend, Memo falls gravely ill. Isolated in their boarding school located in the snowy mountains, tensions run high as Yusuf’s calls for help for Memo becomes increasingly difficult in the face of an authoritarian and bureaucratic system.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ghosts Of The Past
programme.desc: Ex-gang leader Degen escapes prison after 19 years, putting inspector Sarah Kohr and prosecutor Anton Mehringer in danger. Unable to count on the authorities without risking their secrets, they must confront their pasts when Degen kidnaps Anton's son.

programme.title: Confetti
programme.desc: Due to her dyslexia, Meimei is ostracized by her school and community. Encouraged by Meimei's teacher from school, Lan leaves everything behind in China for New York City in hopes of finding an education program for her daughter.

programme.title: Natatorium
programme.desc: Lilja stays with her estranged grandparents while she auditions for a performance group. When her dad and aunt find out, a sense of panic arises. Dark secrets emerge from the household that threaten to destroy her future career and her life.

programme.title: Earth - EP 2
programme.desc: This revealing biography of Earth explores the planet's most epic moments. From the first raindrops that turned it into a water world to the arrival of its most incredible inhabitants, us. But humans take a back seat in this narrative. Instead, Earth is placed centre stage. We see what happened to our world before we even crawled from the mud - including massive bombardments from space, extreme changes in climate and the collision of whole continents.

programme.title: Patagonia - Series 1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Over six stunning episodes, expert local crews join an international team of the world's best wildlife filmmakers to explore uncharted territory, discover new species and tell an urgent environmental story. Patagonia travels the 2000-mile length and Atlantic-to-Pacific breadth of this vast, enigmatic region to illuminate five distinct terrains: majestic mountains, the far south, dense forests, hostile deserts and breath-taking fjordlands.

programme.title: Okavango: A Flood Of Life
programme.desc: This breathtakingly beautiful blue-chip natural history film showcases how the great annual flood transforms the Botswana desert from a dust bowl into a vast, lush paradise and one of the most diverse habitats on Earth. Through extraordinary access from the air, Okavango: A Flood of Life reveals the incredible story of the Okavango Delta.

programme.title: Catch The Wind
programme.desc: Edith is a middle-aged woman, estranged from her son and now about to lose her job as a textile factory worker. With nothing to hold her to her hometown, she decides to move to Morocco where her factory has relocated instead of facing unemployment.

programme.title: Adventures In The Land Of Asha
programme.desc: After 9-year-old Jules is banned from school because of his rare skin disease, his greatest wish is to be cured. He meets a mysterious new friend, Asha, after his dog runs away into the forest. Together, they go on an adventure to find a cure for him.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ghosts Of The Past
programme.desc: Ex-gang leader Degen escapes prison after 19 years, putting inspector Sarah Kohr and prosecutor Anton Mehringer in danger. Unable to count on the authorities without risking their secrets, they must confront their pasts when Degen kidnaps Anton's son.

programme.title: Natatorium
programme.desc: Lilja stays with her estranged grandparents while she auditions for a performance group. When her dad and aunt find out, a sense of panic arises. Dark secrets emerge from the household that threaten to destroy her future career and her life.

programme.title: Out Of The Blue
programme.desc: A successful and dashing young man whose life of one-night stands seems to be going great until a teenybopper, claiming to be his daughter, knocks on his door.

programme.title: A House In Jerusalem
programme.desc: Grappling with the loss of her mother, Rebecca and her father relocate to Jerusalem for a fresh start. In the eerie Valley of the Ghosts, strange occurrences unfold, and Rebecca embarks on a journey to unravel the mysteries within the old house and city.

programme.title: King of Devil's Island
programme.desc: Norwegian winter, early 20th century. On the boys’ home Bastoy, a new inmate leads the boys to a violent uprising against a brutal regime. How far is he willing to go to attain freedom? Based on a true story.

programme.title: Particles
programme.desc: As winter sets in and P.A. sees the world shifting around him, he starts to observe strange phenomena in the environment. The changes are imperceptible at first, but gradually his whole world seems to be on the brink.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ghost Lights
programme.desc: In a post-pandemic Europe, conspiracy theorist Felix Morgenroth becomes obsessed with exposing the "coronavirus lie." Convinced that physicians Carsten and Lisa Kippmann were behind the conspiracy, Felix seeks retribution through a devastating explosion.

programme.title: Wajma, An Afghan Love Story
programme.desc: In conservative Kabul, young Wajma discovers she is pregnant out of wedlock. Her boyfriend denies paternity and her father locks her up for being a disgrace. Driven by desperation, Wajma takes extreme measures forcing everyone to re-think their actions.

programme.title: The Kiss
programme.desc: In 1913 Denmark, young officer Anton grapples with duty and love when he befriends Baron von Løvenskjold's daughter, Edith, confined to a wheelchair. As their bond deepens, Anton is ensnared in a web of promises and lies, torn between pity and true love.

programme.title: On The Edge
programme.desc: On a taxi ride to see his family, a man meets and shares the ride with mysterious hitchhikers and strangers.

programme.title: Timeline
programme.desc: A romantic reunion turns into a life-or-death game of secrets and survival, where the past cannot stay hidden.

programme.title: The Human Part
programme.desc: While telling his parents and two sisters that he is a successful CEO of a large IT company, Pekka is actually bankrupt and penniless. He cons strangers for money and food. What happens when his parents show up for a surprise visit?
